alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:58PM CDT until July 29 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER AND EAST CENTRAL BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Renova, or near Cleveland, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Drew around 520 PM CDT. Parchman and Rome around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
